name: Pal Up!
description:
Climb to the heavens across worlds, avoiding dangerous enemies in this "Souls-Like" game.





⭐⭐⭐
- Climb to the top using jumps and bounces off the wall.
- Dodge arrows and other projectiles of enemies who want to prevent your ascent!
- Open shortcuts to get back from a fall faster!
- Light a campfire to teleport to other precincts!
- Rest by the campfire to replenish the player's health and resources.
- Souls-Like combat system. Enemy Targer-Lock, Dodge, roll, block.
⭐⭐⭐





⭐⭐⭐
- You play as "Kyoko" a spirit who needs to climb to heaven to save his people.
- Get there as fast as possible , and compare your results with other players and friends.
- A wide variety of worlds and obstacles await you, from winter to desert.
- Use your katana to make a series of strikes against your opponent.
- Explore the world to find auxiliary items.
- Bypass your opponents to deliver the fatal blow and ease the climb.
⭐⭐⭐
